articles.title: Sarah Jessica Parker confirms Sex and the City reboot will address COVID-19 pandemic's impact on NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 55-year-old told Vanity Fair that the pandemic will 'obviously be part of the storyline, because that's the city [these characters] live in. And how has that changed relationships once friends disappear?'
